title: Egypt beat Cameroon on penalties to set up Senegal final
shortDescription: After a goalless 120 minutes, Egypt beat tournament hosts Cameroon 3-1 on penalties to set up a Africa Cup of Nations final showdown against Senegal.

title: Rangnick: Lingard asked for time off | Jesse: My headspace is clear

Manchester City booked their place in the Continental League Cup final against

title: Cole joins Lampard's Everton staff as first-team coach
